dc.title: US District Court - Southern District of Illinois - Home Page
dc.description: The US District Court for the Southern District of Illinois web site provides information on the court (history, maps, directions, and contact numbers), jury duty, filing cases (including downloadable forms), the judges, a court calendar, and a reference section that includes recent opinions.
